references.paper_title: On a measure of the information provided by an experiment
references.reason: This paper is foundational to Bayesian experimental design (BED), the core methodology of this paper.
This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of the BED literature, forming a basis for the current research.
This paper introduces a variational approach to BED, which is highly relevant to the amortized methods explored in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Deep adaptive design: Amortizing sequential Bayesian experimental design
references.reason: This work pioneers the application of amortized methods in BED, directly inspiring the current paper's approach.
This paper introduces Conditional Neural Processes (CNPs), a key neural network architecture used to build the Transformer Neural Decision Process (TNDP) in this paper.
